articles.author: Andrew Miller
articles.title: MSNBC columnist calls for end of NORAD Santa tracker 'out of concern for Santa's safety' from US military - Fox News
articles.description: An MSNBC columnist is calling for the end of the  NORAD Santa tracker claiming that it is time to “decouple” Santa Claus from American military culture.
articles.content:
An MSNBC columnist is calling for the end of the  NORAD Santa tracker, claiming that it is time to "decouple" Santa Claus from American military culture.
In an op-ed published
 on MSNBC.com, opinio… [+4371 chars]

articles.title: Peruvian Government Reacts To Fireboy and Ed Sheeran's “Peru” - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: “Peru, para; peru come dey para” The Peruvian Government has reacted to the latest remix by Fireboy DML’s “Peru” which features Grammy award winner Ed Sheeran. The South American country made this reaction through its official Twitter handle. The tweet insinu…
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singer Wang Leehom's wife says she will not accept house from him - The Star Online
articles.description: TAIPEI (The Straits Times/Asia News Network) Taiwanese-American singer Wang Leehom's divorce saga showed few signs of ebbing as his estranged wife Lee Jinglei posted again on Thursday (Dec 23) to rebut claims against her.
